name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement
description: The SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement interface corresponds to the <feConvolveMatrix> element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.in1
members.description: An SVGAnimatedString corresponding to the in attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.orderX
members.description: An SVGAnimatedInteger corresponding to the order attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.orderY
members.description: An SVGAnimatedInteger corresponding to the order attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.kernelMatrix
members.description: An SVGAnimatedNumberList corresponding to the kernelMatrix attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.divisor
members.description: An SVGAnimatedNumber corresponding to the divisor attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.bias
members.description: An SVGAnimatedNumber corresponding to the bias attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.targetX
members.description: An SVGAnimatedInteger corresponding to the targetX attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.targetY
members.description: An SVGAnimatedInteger corresponding to the targetY attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.edgeMode
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the edgeMode attribute of the given element. Takes one of the SVG_EDGEMODE_* constants defined on this interface.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.kernelUnitLengthX
members.description: An SVGAnimatedNumber corresponding to the kernelUnitLength attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.kernelUnitLengthY
members.description: An SVGAnimatedNumber corresponding to the kernelUnitLength attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGFEConvolveMatrixElement.preserveAlpha
members.description: An SVGAnimatedBoolean corresponding to the preserveAlpha attribute of the given element.
